languages.text: "Неведомо. Кэрлы Калькасара не допустили никого в тайные арсеналы — только и видно, как таскают какие-то ящики на поверхность. Извечный порядок — пока мы бьемся, они гребут трофеи со всех рук". {n}Торбальд мрачно кивает на пару трупов.{/n} "И вот этих подняли снизу. Кто знает, может сами их и прикончили, чтобы ничего не разболтали".

"I know not. Calcazar's kaerls did not allow anyone into the hidden arsenals. All we could see was them dragging crates up to the surface. 'Tis the age-old way — we fight, they sweep up the spoils." {n}Thorbald grimly nods at the pair of corpses.{/n} "We brought these from below. For all I know, it was his kaerls that killed them to seal their lips."
languages.original_text: "Неведомо. Кэрлы Калькасара не допустили никого в тайные арсеналы — только и видно, как таскают какие-то ящики на поверхность. Извечный порядок — пока мы бьемся, они гребут трофеи со всех рук". {n}Торбальд мрачно кивает на пару трупов.{/n} "И вот этих подняли снизу. Кто знает, может сами их и прикончили, чтобы ничего не разболтали".

For all I know, it's his kaerls that killed them to seal their lips."

languages.text: “我不清楚，卡尔卡扎手下的武装农奴不允许任何人进入隐藏的军火库，我们只看到他们把箱子拖到了地表上。很久以前就是这样了，我们负责战斗，他们负责搜刮战利品。”{n}索巴德面无表情，对两具尸体点了点头。{/n}“这些尸体是我们从下面带上来的。我只知道，是卡尔卡扎的走狗杀了她们，灭了她们的口。”
languages.original_text: "I know not. Calcazar's kaerls did not allow anyone into the hidden arsenals. All we could see was them dragging crates up to the surface. 'Tis the age-old way — we fight, they sweep up the spoils." {n}Thorbald grimly nods at the pair of corpses.{/n} "We brought these from below. For all I know, it was his kaerls that killed them to seal their lips."

traits.locale_text: “我不清楚，卡尔卡扎手下的武装农奴不允许任何人进入隐藏的军火库，我们只看到他们把箱子拖到了地表上。很久以前就是这样了，我们负责战斗，他们负责搜刮战利品。”{n}索巴德面无表情，对两局尸体点了点头。{/n}“这些尸体是我们从下面带上来的。我只知道，是卡尔卡扎的走狗杀了她们，灭了他们的口。”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: « Je l'ignore. Les kaerls de Calcazar ont interdit l'accès aux arsenaux cachés, nous les avons simplement vus remonter des caisses à la surface. Vous savez ce que c'est : nous combattons, et ils accaparent le butin, {n}dit Thorbald en indiquant les deux cadavres d'un signe de tête.{/n} Nous avons remonté ces deux-là. Pour ce que j'en sais, c'est sans doute ses kaerls qui les ont tuées pour les faire taire. »
languages.original_text: "I know not. Calcazar's kaerls did not allow anyone into the hidden arsenals. All we could see was them dragging crates up to the surface. 'Tis the age-old way — we fight, they sweep up the spoils." {n}Thorbald grimly nods at the pair of corpses.{/n} "We brought these from below. For all I know, it was his kaerls that killed them to seal their lips."

traits.locale_text: « Je l'ignore. Les kaerls de Calcazar ont interdit l'accès aux arsenaux cachés, nous les avons simplement vus remonter des caisses à la surface. Vous savez ce que c'est : nous combattons, et ils accaparent le butin. » {n}Thorbald indique les deux cadavres d'un signe de tête.{/n} « Nous avons remonté ces deux-là. Pour ce que j'en sais, c'est sans doute ses kaerls qui les ont tuées pour les faire taire. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: 「わからない。カルカサルのカールたちは、隠し兵器庫に入ることを何人にも許さなかった。俺たちが見ることができたのは、奴らが木箱を地表まで引きずっていく姿のみ。我々は戦い、奴らは戦利品を掃き集める…まあ、昔からのやり方だ」{n}トールバルドはふたりの死体を見て不機嫌そうにうなずいた。{/n}「こいつらは下から運んできた。俺が知る限り、カールは口封じのためにこいつらを殺した」
languages.original_text: "I know not. Calcazar's kaerls did not allow anyone into the hidden arsenals. All we could see was them dragging crates up to the surface. 'Tis the age-old way — we fight, they sweep up the spoils." {n}Thorbald grimly nods at the pair of corpses.{/n} "We brought these from below. For all I know, it was his kaerls that killed them to seal their lips."

traits.locale_text: 「わからない。カルカサルのカールたちは、隠し兵器庫に入ることを何人にも許さなかった。俺たちが見ることができたのは、奴らが木箱を地表まで引きずっていく姿のみ。我々は戦い、奴らは戦利品を掃き集める…まあ、昔からのやり方だ」{n}トールバルドはふたりの死体を見て不機嫌そうにうなずいた。{/n}「こいつらは下から運んできた。俺が知る限り、カールは口封じのためにこいつらを殺した」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: «No lo sé. Los kaerls de Calcazar restringían el acceso a los arsenales secretos. Solo veíamos cómo arrastraban cajas a la superficie. Lleva siendo así toda la vida: nosotros luchamos y ellos se llevan el botín». {n}Thorbald asiente con la cabeza al par de cadáveres.{/n} «A estas las sacamos de abajo. Que yo sepa, los mataron sus kaerls para que no abrieran el pico».
languages.original_text: "I know not. Calcazar's kaerls did not allow anyone into the hidden arsenals. All we could see was them dragging crates up to the surface. 'Tis the age-old way — we fight, they sweep up the spoils." {n}Thorbald grimly nods at the pair of corpses.{/n} "We brought these from below. For all I know, it was his kaerls that killed them to seal their lips."

traits.locale_text: «No lo sé. Los kaerls de Calcazar restringían el acceso a los arsenales secretos. Solo veíamos cómo arrastraban cajas a la superficie. Lleva siendo así toda la vida: nosotros luchamos y ellos se llevan el botín». {n}Thorbald asiente con la cabeza al par de cadáveres.{/n} «A estas las sacamos de abajo. Que yo sepa, los mataron sus kaerls para que no abrieran el pico».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: "Ich weiß es nicht. Calcazars Kaerls haben niemanden in die geheimen Arsenale gelassen. Wir konnten nur sehen, wie sie Kisten an die Oberfläche geschleppt haben. So war das schon immer — wir kämpfen, sie streichen die Beute ein." {n}Thorbald nickt düster in Richtung der zwei Leichen.{/n} "Die haben wir von unten hochgeholt. Vielleicht haben seine Kaerls sie getötet, um ihre Lippen zu versiegeln, wer weiß."
languages.original_text: "I know not. Calcazar's kaerls did not allow anyone into the hidden arsenals. All we could see was them dragging crates up to the surface. 'Tis the age-old way — we fight, they sweep up the spoils." {n}Thorbald grimly nods at the pair of corpses.{/n} "We brought these from below. For all I know, it was his kaerls that killed them to seal their lips."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß es nicht. Calcazars Kaerls haben niemanden in die geheimen Arsenale gelassen. Wir konnten nur sehen, wie sie Kisten an die Oberfläche geschleppt haben. So war das schon immer — wir kämpfen, sie streichen die Beute ein." {n}Thorbald nickt düster in Richtung der zwei Leichen.{/n} "Die haben wir von unten hochgeholt. Vielleicht haben seine Kaerls sie getötet, um ihre Lippen zu versiegeln, wer weiß."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: "Bilmiyorum. Calcazar'ın müstahdemleri, kimsenin saklı cephaneliklere erişmesine izin vermedi. Bir tek kasaları yüzeye sürüklediklerini görebildik. Böyle gelmiş böyle gider bu gelenek: Biz savaşırız, ganimetleri onlar toplar." {n}Thorbald, karamsarca başıyla yerdeki iki cesedi işaret ediyor.{/n} "Bunları aşağıdan getirdik. Bildiğim tek şey şu: Bilgi veremesinler diye Calcazar'ın müstahdemlerince katledildiler."
languages.original_text: "I know not. Calcazar's kaerls did not allow anyone into the hidden arsenals. All we could see was them dragging crates up to the surface. 'Tis the age-old way — we fight, they sweep up the spoils." {n}Thorbald grimly nods at the pair of corpses.{/n} "We brought these from below. For all I know, it was his kaerls that killed them to seal their lips."
